DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect anthocyanin-rich polyphenol blend anthocyanin-rich polyphenol blend combine prebiotic blend fecal microbiota metabolism ( assess gas chromatograph - mass spectrometry ( GC-MS ) headspace analysis ) fecal microbiota composition ( assessed next generation sequence ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Proprietary Dietary Supplement Fecal Volatile Organic Compounds
DOC.criteria: Male female race ethnicity 18 70 year age , inclusive ; Body mass index ( BMI ) 20 32 inclusive ; Nonsmoking status ; Willing consume assign dietary supplement total 6 week ; Have access email digital camera camera phone . Age < 18 > 70 year ; BMI < 20 > 32 ; Uncontrolled hypertension define diastolic blood pressure ≥95 mm Hg systolic blood pressure ≥160 mm Hg ; Selfreported presence atherosclerotic disease and/or cardiopulmonary disease ; Renal , hepatic , endocrine , gastrointestinal systemic disease ; For woman , pregnancy , breast feed postpartum le 6 month ; Current participation another research study ; Allergy component dietary supplement ( inulin , fructooligosaccharide , blueberry , black currant , rice ) ; History drug alcohol abuse ; Use antibiotic within last 6 month ; Use prebiotics flavonoidcontaining dietary supplement within last 30 day ; Multiple food allergy significant food preference restriction would interfere diet adherence ; Chronic use overthecounter medication would interfere study endpoint include NSAIDS , laxatives antacid ; Participating plan begin weight loss diet study period ; Lifestyle schedule incompatible study protocol ; Other medical , psychiatric , behavioral condition view principal investigator may present safety hazard participant interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol ; Use tobacco product .
